statements: SELECT * FROM species_occurrence;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_time >= '12:00:00';
SELECT id, species_name FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, observation_notes FROM species_occurrence WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY species_name DESC, observation_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY observation_date ASC
SELECT species_name, observation_notes FROM species_occurrence WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_notes IS NOT NULL AND observation_date = '2022-03-15' ORDER BY latitude DESC, observation_time ASC
SELECT id, species_name, observation_date FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_date = CURDATE() ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT species_name, observation_date FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_impacts WHERE impact_type = 'Drought';
SELECT species_name, impact_description FROM species_occurrence INNER JOIN climate_impacts ON species_occurrence.species_id = climate_impacts.species_id;
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY observation_date DESC
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY species_name ASC, observation_date DESC
SELECT species_name, impact_type, impact_description FROM species_occurrence JOIN climate_impacts ON species_occurrence.species_id = climate_impacts.species_id

SELECT species_name, impact_date FROM species_occurrence JOIN climate_impacts ON species_occurrence.species_id = climate_impacts.species_id WHERE climate_impacts.impact_type = 'Flood' ORDER BY impact_date DESC
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence_data ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, occurrence_latitude, occurrence_longitude FROM species_occurrence_data WHERE occurrence_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, occurrence_latitude, occurrence_longitude FROM species_occurrence_data WHERE occurrence_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY occurrence_latitude ASC;
SELECT species_name, occurrence_longitude FROM species_occurrence_data WHERE occurrence_latitude BETWEEN -30.0 AND -20.0;
SELECT * FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distribution_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence_data WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, occurrence_latitude, occurrence_longitude FROM species_occurrence_data WHERE occurrence_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, distribution_area FROM species_occurrence_data JOIN species_distribution ON species_occurrence_data.species_id = species_distribution.species_id;
SELECT * FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_start_date < '2022-06-01' AND distribution_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT species_name FROM species_occurrence_data ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE species_population > 1000;
SELECT species_id, species_name, species_type FROM species ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_probability > 0.5;
SELECT occurrence_date, occurrence_location FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY occurrence_date;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM species WHERE species_population > 1000;
SELECT species_name, occurrence_date, occurrence_location FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT s.species_name, d.temperature_mean, d.precipitation_mean FROM species s JOIN climate_data d ON s.species_id = d.data_id;
SELECT s.species_name, sd.distribution_region, sd.distribution_probability FROM species s JOIN species_distribution sd ON s.species_id = sd.species_id WHERE sd.distribution_probability > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM species_occurrence;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT observation_date, species_name FROM species_occurrence ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT region, distribution_probability FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY region;
SELECT * FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_probability > 0.8;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species_occurrence WHERE observation_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT distribution_id, region, distribution_probability FROM species_distribution WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT species_name, impact_description, impact_date FROM species_occurrence JOIN species_impact ON species_occurrence.species_id = species_impact.species_id;
